title: Iceland Volcano Erupts, Spewing Lava Fountains
content: A volcano in southwestern Iceland erupted on Thursday, the meteorological office said, spraying red-hot lava and smoke in its sixth outbreak since December.
summary: A volcano in southwestern Iceland erupted on Thursday, the meteorological office said, spraying red-hot lava and smoke in its sixth outbreak since December.

title: Manhunt In Arizona For Suspect Who Threatened To Kill Trump
content: An Arizona man is wanted after threatening over social media to kill former President Donald Trump, the Cochise County Sheriff's Office said on Thursday.
summary: An Arizona man is wanted after threatening over social media to kill former President Donald Trump, the Cochise County Sheriff's Office said on Thursday.

title: Live: Kamala Harris To Address Nation On Final Day Of Democratic Convention
content: US Vice President Kamala Harris is poised to address the American public on the final night of the National Democratic Convention (DNC) in Chicago on Thursday.
summary: US Vice President Kamala Harris is poised to address the American public on the final night of the National Democratic Convention (DNC) in Chicago on Thursday.

title: Kamala Harris To Take The Stage On Last Day Of Democratic Convention
content: The Democratic National Convention, a four-day mega event which saw a tearful Joe Biden getting a farewell, and Kamala Harris making a surprise entry in a tan suit, will end today.
summary: The Democratic National Convention, a four-day mega event which saw a tearful Joe Biden getting a farewell, and Kamala Harris making a surprise entry in a tan suit, will end today.

title: What Will Kamala Harris Speak About On Day 4 Of Democratic Convention
content: Kamala Harris is poised to deliver the biggest speech of her political life on Thursday as she accepts the Democratic presidential nomination in Chicago after a historic turnaround in the 2024 White House race.
summary: Kamala Harris is poised to deliver the biggest speech of her political life on Thursday as she accepts the Democratic presidential nomination in Chicago after a historic turnaround in the 2024 White House race.

title: UN Chief Hopes PM Modi's Visit To Ukraine Will Help End War
content: UN Secretary-General hopes that Prime Minister Narendra Modi's visit to Ukraine will contribute to ending the war, his Spokesperson Stephane Dujarric said on Thursday.
summary: UN Secretary-General hopes that Prime Minister Narendra Modi's visit to Ukraine will contribute to ending the war, his Spokesperson Stephane Dujarric said on Thursday.

title: Nestle CEO Mark Schneider To Step Down, Laurent Freixe To Take Over
content: Nestle chief executive Mark Schneider is leaving the Swiss food group after eight years in charge and will be replaced by Latin America boss Laurent Freixe, the company said Thursday.
summary: Nestle chief executive Mark Schneider is leaving the Swiss food group after eight years in charge and will be replaced by Latin America boss Laurent Freixe, the company said Thursday.

title: Man Throws Open Plane Emergency Door On Landing, Climbs Over Wing
content: A passenger on Australian budget carrier Jetstar threw open an emergency door and exited by clambering over the wing and engine after landing in Melbourne on Thursday, officials said.
summary: A passenger on Australian budget carrier Jetstar threw open an emergency door and exited by clambering over the wing and engine after landing in Melbourne on Thursday, officials said.

title: 6-Year-Old Boy Found Alive In Vietnam Forest After 4 Days
content: A six-year-old boy missing for four days was found alive in a forest in a mountainous part of northern Vietnam, police said Thursday.
summary: A six-year-old boy missing for four days was found alive in a forest in a mountainous part of northern Vietnam, police said Thursday.

title: "Let Us Choose Joy!' Oprah Winfrey Urges US Voters In Chicago
content: US talk show host Oprah Winfrey made a surprise appearance at the Democratic National Convention in Chicago on Wednesday, calling on her fellow independent voters to vote for "joy".
summary: US talk show host Oprah Winfrey made a surprise appearance at the Democratic National Convention in Chicago on Wednesday, calling on her fellow independent voters to vote for "joy".

title: Venezuela Court Confirms President Maduro's Re-Election After Fraud Claims
content: Venezuela's Supreme Court, which observers say is loyal to the government of President Nicolas Maduro, on Thursday declared him the winner of the disputed July 28 election amid opposition claims of widespread vote fraud.
summary: Venezuela's Supreme Court, which observers say is loyal to the government of President Nicolas Maduro, on Thursday declared him the winner of the disputed July 28 election amid opposition claims of widespread vote fraud.

title: Ukrainian Refugees Forced Onto Streets After Hungarian Asylum Rule Change
content: The move has already led to evictions from private shelters, with around 2,000-3,000 refugees potentially losing their housing.
summary: The move has already led to evictions from private shelters, with around 2,000-3,000 refugees potentially losing their housing.

title: TikTok Ban Lifted In Nepal, Was Suspended For Disturbing "Social Harmony"
content: Nepal on Thursday lifted its ban on TikTok nine months after suspending the popular video-sharing platform for disturbing "social harmony", the communications minister said.
summary: Nepal on Thursday lifted its ban on TikTok nine months after suspending the popular video-sharing platform for disturbing "social harmony", the communications minister said.

title: Bangladesh's Interim Government Revokes Sheikh Hasina's Diplomatic Passport
content: Bangladesh's interim government revoked the diplomatic passport of ousted premier Sheikh Hasina on Thursday, after she fled a student-led uprising by helicopter to India earlier this month.
summary: Bangladesh's interim government revoked the diplomatic passport of ousted premier Sheikh Hasina on Thursday, after she fled a student-led uprising by helicopter to India earlier this month.

title: $1,500 Cash Reward For "Vampire" Serial Killer Who Escaped Kenyan Prison
content: Kenyan police offered a cash reward on Thursday for information leading to the arrest of a suspected serial killer who escaped from a Nairobi police cell.
summary: Kenyan police offered a cash reward on Thursday for information leading to the arrest of a suspected serial killer who escaped from a Nairobi police cell.

title: Singapore Detects 13 Cases Of Mpox Clade 2 Infection
content: Singapore has detected 13 cases of mpox Clade 2 infections this year, the health ministry said in a bulletin on Thursday.
summary: Singapore has detected 13 cases of mpox Clade 2 infections this year, the health ministry said in a bulletin on Thursday.

title: Bangladesh's Interim Government Seeks $1 Billion From World Bank
content: Bangladesh's interim government has sought $1 billion from the World Bank as budgetary support.
summary: Bangladesh's interim government has sought $1 billion from the World Bank as budgetary support.

title: 6 Killed, 11 Injured In Hotel Fire In South Korea: Report
content: A fire at a hotel in South Korea killed six people and injured 11 others, Yonhap news agency reported on Thursday, citing fire authorities.
summary: A fire at a hotel in South Korea killed six people and injured 11 others, Yonhap news agency reported on Thursday, citing fire authorities.

title: Andrew Tate Ordered To Be Placed Under House Arrest In Romania: Court
content: A Romanian court has ordered internet personality Andrew Tate to be placed under house arrest, his representative said on Thursday, after he was among six people taken into custody in an investigation into human trafficking and sexual exploitation.
summary: A Romanian court has ordered internet personality Andrew Tate to be placed under house arrest, his representative said on Thursday, after he was among six people taken into custody in an investigation into human trafficking and sexual exploitation.

title: Chinese Scientists Use Lunar Soil To Generate Water In New Method: Report
content: Chinese scientists have discovered a "brand-new method" of producing large quantities of water using lunar soil brought back from a 2020 expedition, state broadcaster CCTV reported on Thursday.
summary: Chinese scientists have discovered a "brand-new method" of producing large quantities of water using lunar soil brought back from a 2020 expedition, state broadcaster CCTV reported on Thursday.
